title: Donation
text: Donate to St Mark Universal Copts Care with a one-off donation or by becoming an ongoing supporter of our many life-saving/life-changing initiatives.

title: Fundraise
text: We are grateful for all the support that we receive, because every donation, however small, enables us to do the right thing in support of those without a voice.

title: Corporate
text: Whether in Egypt or the UK, we would welcome more businesses to become corporate partners with us, to help deliver on our goals.

title: Legacies
text: Are you considering leaving a legacy to St Mark Universal Copts Care to support our future work providing healthcare relief and socio-economic development to some of the most disadvantaged communities across the Middle East?

title: Collection box
text: If you have a place you would like to host a box, we can supply the box and come to empty it either on regular visits, or when you let us know it is getting full.  Our boxes are fully branded and show the work of the charity.
